title: Now that we have 10 bans, who is going to be your permabanned champion?
body: For me I won't get in a game with a {{champion:154}} or a {{champion:157}} ever again (god bless).

replies.body: If I'm going botlane, then {{champion:53}} . Otherwise whoever is the current FOTM.

> If I'm going botlane, then {{champion:53}} . Otherwise whoever is the current FOTM.

That's me as a support main.

You can say 'learn 2 dodge pulls noob!' all you want, but even if I outplay him in lane the entire laning phase, it just takes one. good. pull. to end the game.
Doesn't matter if he misses 9/10 shots, that just means you'll die once every ten hooks >_0

You don't get a zed!
   You don't get a zed!

                                                 No one gets a zed!
there is a lot of counter picks to zed tho and low elo zeds are potatos that are free farm

I guess i posted this from the wrong account, i'm beyond(as far as that means) the potatos... i miss the potatos.


Can i have the potatos back?



I'm hungry now.

As much as I hate assassins for their playstyle, I have to admit that it's fun to play against Zed.

That is until he gets Hexdrinker. Fuck Lifeline on Hexdrinker.
Have you been able to actually get 10 bans yet? Both games I've played it's been the usual 6.
10 in normal draft, coming to ranked in a week.
I'm being assured that 10 bans is live, but I have reason to believe that it isn't true...
The patch notes says that it would enabled sometime in the patch (AKA: not right away)
Still 6 for me
I don't think they enabled it yet. I'm still getting 6, even in normal draft.
Katarina. Every time I've let one through draft she becomes an unstable menace, so it's better if I just don't.
I haven't seen kat played since her rework

I'd consider you lucky then. Her level 2 is very strong, and *a lot* of players underestimate her damage, which in turn helps the snowballing menace get rolling. I can handle her ok in Mid, but then she wanders off and gets a kill or assist, starts being a problem, and everyone blames me for it because she was laning against me...
{{champion:7}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:91}} because those are the three biggest counters  to my {{champion:115}}
{{champion:69}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:154}}  whichever I hate most out of those that game
No more Yasuo EVER again
{{champion:11}}
Perma baning {{champion:114}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:157}}  in that order
Someone told me that it's tomorrow apparently, which doesn't make sense to me. It doesn't say live tomorrow, it says live now haha.
Darius or Lee Sin. Nice, appropriate bans for my rank.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/10-bans-live-normal-draft

It says it's live.... but... somehow I feel like that isn't accurate.
Darius
Zac, Renekton, or Darius.
